trans-unit.source: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

Type converters and markup extensions can query for <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlNamespaceResolver> as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior.

For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).
This interface is also implemented as part of the WPF XAML implementation in the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDictionary> class.

<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDictionary> stores XAML namespace information and interacts with XAML processors to forward that information to the service context through the same <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver> interface.
Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.
The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.
The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.
Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings (<xref href="System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration"></xref> values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.
To get all the prefix strings, get the <xref href="System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration.Prefix"></xref> value from each value in the returned set.
To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired <xref href="System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration.Namespace"></xref> value.
